effect.short: Raises the user's Speed by two stages and halves the user's weight.
effect.full: Raises the user's Speed by two stages.  Halves the user's weight; this effect does not stack.

flavorTexts.text:
The user sheds part of its body to make itself lighter
and sharply raise its Speed stat.
